levelupDescription: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells. When I level up, create a Final Spark in hand.
flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"
name: Lux
